thread.title: BRIEF-Rigel Pharmaceuticals Says Expects To Report About $94.3 Mln Cash, Cash Equivalents, Short-Term Investments As Of March 31, 2018

title: BRIEF-Rigel Pharmaceuticals Says Expects To Report About $94.3 Mln Cash, Cash Equivalents, Short-Term Investments As Of March 31, 2018
text:
Market News April 20, 2018 / 8:29 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Rigel Pharmaceuticals Says Expects To Report About $94.3 Mln Cash, Cash Equivalents, Short-Term Investments As Of March 31, 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Rigel Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* RIGEL PHARMACEUTICALS SAYS EXPECTS TO REPORT IT HAD ABOUT $94.3 MILLION CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS, SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2Jedbsn ) Further company coverage:
